title: Tips for Buying the Best Macbook Pro
summary: The 13-inch Macbook Pro is the most popular version, and the one we would recommend to most people. It's not the most powerful, but it’s powerful enough for most people, and it's great for everyday use. The 15-inch version is the best option for people who need more power. The Touch Bar is only available with a Touch Bar, so if you don’t need it, you need to go with the 15-in version. The 17-inch model is the biggest, with a battery life of up to 10 hours, and is great for watching movies and TV shows. It comes in both the 13-in and the Touch Bar version.

But with so many different versions to choose from, it can be difficult to know which one is right for you. Do you need a Touch Bar or not? What screen size do you need? How much storage space do you need? These are all questions you need to ask yourself before buying a Macbook Pro.
If you\u2019re thinking about buying a Macbook Pro, here are some helpful tips to make sure you get the best model for your needs. The Macbook Pro comes in 13-inch, 15-inch and 17-inch screens, so that\u2019s the first thing to consider when buying one. You also want to decide whether you need an integrated GPU (not all models have them) and how much storage space you want.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

It\u2019s compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around. It\u2019s also the cheapest option, making it a great choice if you\u2019re on a budget. It\u2019s a great laptop for running multiple programs at once, with 8 GB RAM and a 256 GB SSD, and if you\u2019re a student or someone who travels a lot, this is the one we would recommend. It\u2019s not the most powerful laptop, but it\u2019s powerful enough for most people, and it\u2019s great for everyday use. It\u2019s the most reliable version too, so it\u2019s definitely worth considering if you\u2019re after a Macbook Pro."),mdx("h2",null,"15-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 15-inch Macbook Pro is the best version for people who need more power. It\u2019s a more heavyweight option, but it\u2019s great if you run heavy programs like photo editing, video editing or if you\u2019re a designer. The bigger screen size is also great for watching movies and TV shows, so if you\u2019re an avid TV binger, this one is a good option. One thing to note is that the 15-inch Macbook Pro is only available with a Touch Bar, so if you don\u2019t need a Touch Bar, it\u2019s not worth the extra money. It\u2019s also a more expensive option, so it\u2019s worth considering if you really need a more powerful laptop. It\u2019s a great option for people who run programming, design or video editing software regularly."),mdx("h2",null,"17-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 17-inch Macbook Pro is the best option for people who need a laptop for work. It\u2019s the most powerful option out of the Macbook Pros, as it has two fans to keep the laptop cool, and a giant battery life of up to 10 hours. It\u2019s also the biggest, so if portability is important to you, it\u2019s definitely worth avoiding. That said, it\u2019s the best option for people who need their laptop to run multiple programs at once, making it the best option for people who work regularly on the go."),mdx("p",null,"It\u2019s worth noting that it comes with an IGP instead of a discrete GPU, so it\u2019s not the best option for editing videos or running graphic design software. If you need a laptop for work, this is the best option, but it\u2019s worth considering if you want something more portable."),mdx("h2",null,"Touch Bar Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The Touch Bar Macbook Pro comes in both the 15-inch and the 13-inch version and costs a little more than the non-Touch Bar version. It\u2019s a great option if you\u2019re after a Touch Bar, but don\u2019t want to pay the extra money for the IGP. It\u2019s a good choice if you want the Touch Bar, but don\u2019t want a more heavyweight option. It\u2019s also worth noting that the 13-inch model is lighter and more compact than the 15-inch model, so if portability is important to you, it\u2019s worth considering. It\u2019s worth noting that the 13-inch model is only available with an IGP, so if you want a Touch Bar, you need to go with the 15-inch model."),mdx("h2",null,"Integrated Graphics Processor (IGP) Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The IGP Macbook Pro comes in both the 13 and 15-inch versions, and it\u2019s the cheapest option, making it great if you\u2019re on a budget. That said, it\u2019s worth being aware that the IGP makes it more difficult for programs to run at once, so it\u2019s not the best option for people who run heavy programs regularly. It\u2019s a good option for people who want to use the Macbook Pro for everyday tasks, and don\u2019t need a laptop for work. It\u2019s definitely worth considering if you want a cheap Macbook Pro, but it\u2019s worth being aware that you won\u2019t get the best performance out of the three."),mdx("h2",null,"Storage Space and RAM in the Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The Macbook Pro comes with either 128 GB, 256 GB, 512 GB or 1 TB of storage space, so if storage space is important to you, it\u2019s worth considering how much you need. 128 GB is the minimum amount of storage space needed, but if you\u2019re someone who likes to store a lot on their laptop, or if you need to regularly store files, it\u2019s worth going for the 256 GB or 512 GB option."),mdx("p",null,"The Macbook Pro also comes with 8 GB or 16 GB of RAM, so if you need more than 8 GB, it\u2019s worth considering the 16 GB option. It\u2019s important to note that models with 16 GB of RAM only come with the 1 TB of storage space, so it\u2019s worth keeping that in mind if you need more storage space."),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"The MacBook Pro is an excellent choice for people who want a laptop for a variety of different tasks. They\u2019re light, compact, and durable. You can use your MacBook for work, school, or play. You can also pair it with an Apple monitor for a dual-monitor setup. However, there is a downside to MacBooks: they\u2019re not as powerful as Macbook Pros.
If you want to get more from your laptop \u2014 especially if you plan on using it for intensive tasks such as photo editing or video editing \u2014 you need a Macbook Pro. The difference between the two models isn\u2019t large enough to be noticeable unless you really dig into their specs. The Macbook is better suited for casual users because of its lower price tag and reduced weight. But if you\u2019re considering buying a new laptop anytime soon, read these 5 reasons why You Need A Macbook Pro instead of the standard one.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The digital age has made it possible for people to work from virtually anywhere at any time. As a result, more people are leaving the office behind and working remotely or taking up independent contracting gigs, which is why we\u2019re seeing so many young professionals ditch cubicles for coffee shops and other remote-friendly offices.
Working from home, going independent, or collaborating with coworkers online means millennials have given rise to what some have called \u201Cthe gig economy.\u201D It\u2019s also prompted a shift in the types of companies people choose to work for and what skills they need to get hired in those roles \u2014 regardless of where they do that work. If you\u2019re looking to join this world of work in 2020, here\u2019s everything you need to know:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The world is on the cusp of an exciting new era in wireless technology, as the rollout of fifth generation (5G) cellular networks begins across the globe.
Even though 4G LTE coverage is widespread and newer 5G networks aren\u2019t quite ready for large-scale implementation just yet, carriers around the world are already testing out pre-Release 15 5G network services. Several national operators have already begun deploying their 5G network infrastructure, while others are set to follow suit in the coming months. The race is on to lead the way in this cutting-edge technology and reap the benefits that come with it. It\u2019s a fast-moving space, so here\u2019s everything you need to know about 5G and when you can expect it to launch where you live.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

These AI helpers are no longer just for tech-savvy adults; now, kids as young as five are happily chattering away with cartoon characters like Waffle the Blue Whale or Hank the Crab whenever they need help with something.
However, AI isn\u2019t solely limited to helpful sea creatures or talking speakers. In fact, AI is being used for all kinds of purposes \u2013 from self-driving cars to replacing call center agents with intelligent chatbots. Even businesses are seeing the value in incorporating AI into their day-to-day operations. From automating processes to making data-driven decisions faster, businesses of all sizes can leverage the benefits of AI in order to improve their services and workflows.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

However, Apple Inc remains one of the most successful companies worldwide. In the last few years, particularly after 2013, Apple has lost some of its luster. Investors began to worry about the future of Apple as iPhone sales started falling year over year. The stock price tumbled from a high above $135 per share in September 2014 to just above $90 per share by June 2016.
But this is how investing works \u2014 when an investment falls too much and it becomes cheap relative to its intrinsic value, it\u2019s time to buy more shares! Consider this your ultimate guide on why Apple Inc is a good long-term investment. Keep reading to find out why you should consider buying more shares even though the stock price has fallen so much over such a short period of time.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
